ARABIC: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيْنَهُمْ إِن لَّبِثْتُمْ إِلَّا عَشْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: they will whisper secretly to one other, 'You only stayed for ten.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Whispering to one another: "You have tarried but ten days."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall whisper among themselves: "You stayed on the earth barely ten days."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will slowly talk to each other and say, "Our life on earth was as short as ten days".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Whispering secretly among themselves, “You have not stayed on earth but for ten days.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will speak in a very low voice to each other (saying): "You stayed not longer than ten."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall consult together secretly: You did tarry but ten (centuries).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: whispering one to another, 'You have tarried only ten nights.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Murmuring among themselves: Ye have tarried but ten (days).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and they shall murmur to one another, "You stayed only ten days on the earth" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Mutterin among themselves: ye tarried not save ten days.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will whisper to one another: ‘You have stayed only for ten [days].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In whispers will they consult each other: "Yet tarried not longer than ten (Days);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In whispers will they speak to each other (saying): "You stayed not longer than ten (days)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and they shall murmur among themselves: 'You have stayed away but ten (days and nights)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Murmuring among themselves: “You have lingered only for ten.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:103] They will whisper to one another, speaking secretly amongst themselves: ‘You have tarried, in this world, only ten nights’, with the [full ten] days.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Murmuring among themselves) saying to each other in murmur: (Ye have tarried) in the grave (but ten (days)).
